snippet: An attack by Algerian Army helicopters killed a militant identified by some experts as a regional leader of Al Qaeda.
abstract: Attack by Algerian Army helicopters kills Khalil Ould Addah, militant identified by some experts as a regional leader of Al Qaeda, and four of his associates.
lead_paragraph: An attack by Algerian Army helicopters killed a militant identified by some experts as a regional leader of Al Qaeda.

headline.main: Algeria: Army Kills a Militant Leader, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Algeria: Army Kills a Militant Leader, Official Says

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
